headline: Got $3,000? 3 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks to Buy and Hold for the Long Term.
summary: This travel technology company can drive investor returns through AI-driven decision-making.  When taking these factors into account, investors may want to consider investments in the three following stocks.  Investors will likely struggle to find a company more central to AI than Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing (NYSE: TSM), the leading manufacturer for all of the top chip companies.
